trans-unit.source: Provides information that the <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.XamlTypeMapper"></xref> uses for mapping between an XML namespace, a CLR namespace, and the assembly that contains the relevant types for that CLR namespace.
This type is specific to the WPF implementation of XAML.
If you use it in a general XAML implementation, you must include the WPF assemblies.

Alternative techniques that do not require including WPF assemblies include referencing the XAML schema context (available in a service provider context from <xref:System.Xaml.IXamlSchemaContextProvider>, or from <xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectWriter.SchemaContext%2A?displayProperty=fullName> from a XAML node loop or general XAML writer frame of reference.) The XAML schema context includes API for returning its assemblies, preferred prefix mappings, and XAML namespace information.
XAML Text Usage
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.NamespaceMapEntry"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.NamespaceMapEntry"></xref> class, using provided XML namespace, CLR namespace, and assembly information.
Use the "simple name" form for `assemblyName`.
In particular, do not specify pathing, and do not include the file extension.
This is analogous to the form that might be reported by <xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyName.Name%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
Paths are specified separately; see <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlTypeMapper.SetAssemblyPath%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
The mapping prefix for the XML namespace.
The assembly that contains the CLR namespace and types to map to the XML namespace.
The CLR namespace in the assembly that contains the relevant types.
xmlNamespace is `null`
-or-
assemblyName is `null`
-or-
clrNamespace is `null`.
Gets or sets the assembly name that contains the types in the CLR namespace.
Use the "simple name" form for <xref:System.Windows.Markup.NamespaceMapEntry.AssemblyName%2A>.
In particular, do not specify the full path, and do not include the file extension.
This is analogous to the form that might be reported by <xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyName.Name%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
XAML Text Usage
The assembly name.
The value <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.NamespaceMapEntry.AssemblyName"></xref> is being set to is `null`.
Gets or sets the CLR namespace that contains the types being mapped.
XAML Text Usage
The CLR namespace.
The value <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.NamespaceMapEntry.ClrNamespace"></xref> is being set to is `null`.
Gets or sets the mapping prefix for the XML namespace being mapped to.
XAML Text Usage
The mapping prefix for the XML namespace.
The value <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.NamespaceMapEntry.XmlNamespace"></xref> is being set to is `null`.
